name: Zabuza Momochi
effect:
Mist | Rogue Ninja (Jonin) | Male
[DEMON OF CLOUD VILLAGE]
When this Ninja is the Head Ninja, discard all Ninjas that received Damage from this Ninja's Team.
"I am Zabuza Momochi... 'The Demon of the Hidden Mist'!!"
